General.Name: Lordstown Motors Corp
General.Description: Lordstown Motors Corp. develops, manufactures, and sells Endurance, an electric full-size pickup truck for fleet customers in the United States. Lordstown Motors Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Lordstown, Ohio. On June 27, 2023, Lordstown Motors Corp., along with its affiliates, filed a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11 in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the District of Delaware.
General.Address: 2300 Hallock Young Road, Lordstown, OH, United States, 44481
